text: Zisas Krais, ana Fhe Bakɨme ma. Ana won ŋkasŋkar, ana za kha bigir nza nɨɨŋgi. Mba bigi nza kha ki kɨrɨ tɨvi havharap nzan kurkurigim, nza Fhe Bakɨme suaŋgi tɨvi zɨn vui. Nza mba tɨvir muun zav, ana fhura nza garim, nza tuituigiap ana kaŋgi. Ana wo zɨ bakɨme gum, won ŋkasŋka bakɨme gum, won tɨvar vhuuŋ guarara, nza ana phorgɨv mba bigi ndir zav, ana nzan kamgi.
